about_the_game:
Transistor Defense is a strategic tower defense game where players must fend off the relentless onslaught of a rogue sentient AI determined to dominate the network.

The game features a diverse array of defensive structures, from laser towers that slice through digital foes with precision, to gun towers providing rapid-fire coverage, and missile towers delivering explosive damage to clusters of AI units. As waves of enemies grow in strength, players can enhance their defenses through an intricate upgrade system, enabling various tactical approaches and customization to adapt to the AI’s evolving threats.

In a roguelike twist, after each wave of enemies, players have access to an in-game shop where they can purchase tower upgrades, new abilities, or consumables using resources earned during battle. The shop’s randomized offerings ensure that no two playthroughs are the same, adding an element of unpredictability and strategy to each run.

Adding to the immersive experience, Transistor Defense hosts community events that bring players together to tackle unique challenges and earn exclusive rewards. These events foster collaboration and competition, creating a dynamic and engaging environment for all participants.
